snippet: A writer of prose distinguished by deep research and powerful narrative force, Mr. Unsworth won a Booker Prize in 1992 for “Sacred Hunger.”
abstract: Barry Unsworth, historical novelist, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: A writer of prose distinguished by deep research and powerful narrative force, Mr. Unsworth won a Booker Prize in 1992 for “Sacred Hunger.”

headline.seo: Barry Unsworth, Historical Novelist, Dies at 81
headline.main: Barry Unsworth, Writer of Historical Fiction, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: Barry Unsworth, Writer of Historical Fiction, Dies at 81
